metadata.title: CVE-2013-7488 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: perl-Convert-ASN1 (aka the Convert::ASN1 module for Perl) through 0.27 allows remote attackers to cause an infinite loop via unexpected input.

notes.note: mdeslaur> as of 2020-04-14, proposed fix not commited upstream

criterions.comment: libconvert-asn1-perl package in hirsute is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2020-04-14').
